key.label: Key
key.description: (string) (Required) Name of the style. Should be unique.

source.label: Source
source.description: (string) (Optional) Full URL of the style, or path of the style relative to the WordPress root directory.

dependencies.label: Depends On
dependencies.description:
(string[]) (Optional) An array of registered style handles this style depends on.
			Default value: array()

version.label: Version
version.description: (string|bool|null) (Optional) String specifying style version number, if it has one, which is added to the URL as a query string for cache busting purposes. If version is set to false, a version number is automatically added equal to current installed WordPress version. If set to null, no version is added.

location.label: Location
location.description:
(string[]) (Optional) An array of areas to inject this style. Available values are 'front', 'back' or 'both'.
			Default value: array('front')

footer.label: In Footer
footer.description:
(boolean) (Optional) determine whether to inject this style into the header or footer area.
			Default value: array('front')
